name: Unknown Oblivion Clone
description:
This is just a short Techdemo!

In 2018 i started this project, it was more a less a challenge back then and not a full game project.

Today i present you with the first Techdemo of a few fundamental systems.

Here is a list of core features implemented already in some form:
- Saving/Loading cross Maps
- Inventory and cointainer syste
- Items with item tables
- Basic AI with navigation
- Basic Dungeon Tileset with extra art
- Ingredient Effects like Healthdamage or Healing
- Torches with different colors
- Melee combat and equipment system
- Quickselect system with numeric bindings
- Settings menu!

Please test out this demo until it breaks and then report back what your experience was!

I hope you will have at least 5 minutes of fun, it is just a techdemo!

Might be heavily inspired by Oblivion.
